title: Designing woman
creator_credit: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Dore Schary and Vincente Minnelli
brief_description: An easy-going, unpolished sportswriter and a sophisticated clothing designer meet, fall in love and marry while both are visiting California. When they return to their homes in New York, they decide to live in her plush apartment, and their differences soon emerge. Cast includes Gregory Peck, Lauren Bacall, Dolores Gray, Sam levene. Music by Andre Previn, choreography by Jack Cole.
